title: Home AV Reviews - AVForums
snippet: Sep 22, 2025 · Marantz Cinema 70s 7.2-Channel AV Receiver Review The most diminutive AVR in Marantz's range, the Cinema 70s debuted in 2022. It's a chance to tap into some of the Japanese maker's theatrical magic, but how does it stack up against its bigger siblings?

title: Home AV Products of 2023/24 - Editor's Choice Awards

title: Reviews | AVForums
snippet: Jan 19, 2026 · Reviews from the editorial team at AVForums The Panasonic Z90B is the second from the top OLED TV for the 2025 line-up. It drops the RGB Tandem panel and instead sports the Master OLED Pro panel with the top-end HCX Pro AI MkII Processor and Game Mode Extreme, along with the usual Panasonic image accuracy out of the box. So, is it any good in 2026?

title: Home AV - AVForums
snippet: Dec 18, 2025 · Marantz unveils AV 30 and AMP 30 processor and power amplifier Scaling things down a little further from their 10 and 20 predecessors, the new combination offers a more affordable 11.4-channel preamp/processor and 200W 6-channel power amp solution.
